search.allResults: That be all we 'ave, me hearty!
search.noResults: We couldn't find anythin' that matches yer search!
search.failed: Failed t' find media, walk the plank and try again!

notFound.badge: Ahoy! I see nothin' on the horizon.
notFound.title: Avast ye! Couldn't find that media
notFound.text: We couldn't find the media ye requested. Either it's been scuttled or ye tampered with the URL, ye scallywag!

captions.title: Select a subtitle language, me hearty!

sources.title: Wha' provider do ye want to use?

notFound.badge: Ahoy! I see nothin' on the horizon.
notFound.title: Avast ye! Couldn't find that page.
notFound.message: Arrr! We searched every inch o' the vessel: from the bilge to the crow's nest, from the keel to the topmast, but avast! We couldn't find the page ye be lookin' fer, me heartie.
